     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       New York Times Group Passes &nbsp;
      </span>

            </div>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:750px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox15116894">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="15116894">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title15116894">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Activating the NYTimes.com Pass
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content15116894">
          <p>
           <img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/imagemanager/63912/the_new_york_times_logo.png" alt="New York Times" height="73" width="496" />
          </p>
          <p>
           Trexler Library is happy to offer a NYTimes.com Academic Site License providing full access to news, multimedia, and archives of the New York Times. &nbsp;This access is only available to current Muhlenberg College faculty, students, and staff.
          </p>
          <h2>
           <b>
            To ACTIVATE your PASS:
           </b>
          </h2>
          <ul>
           <li>
            While on campus, connected to our campus network, go to
            <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/grouppass">
             http://www.nytimes.com/grouppass
            </a>
            .
           </li>
           <li>
            Using your
            <b>
             Muhlenberg email address
            </b>
            , click on &lsquo;Create an Account&rsquo; or &lsquo;Log in to Continue&rsquo; if you already have an account.
           </li>
           <li>
            If activated correctly, you should see a screen indicating the expiration of your pass (should be about a year later).
           </li>
           <li>
            Once activated, you may now access NYTimes.com from any device, from any location (using your email address as the username and the password you created for this NYTimes pass).
           </li>
          </ul>
          <h2>
           <b>
            Problems?
           </b>
          </h2>
          <ul>
           <li>
            The Group Pass must be activated while physically within our campus network.
           </li>
           <li>
            After activation, you must be logged in to your NYTimes.com account which is associated with your Group Pass registration (Muhlenberg email address)
           </li>
           <li>
            If you a current NYTimes Digital subscriber (using your Muhlenberg email), you will not be able to claim a pass.&nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            If you have a daily pass, that pass must expire before claim this year long pass.
           </li>
           <li>
            Other issues, contact Tina Hertel (
            <a href="mailto:thertel@muhlenberg.edu">
             thertel@muhlenberg.edu
            </a>
            ) or x3550.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt15116894" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20049926">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20049926">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20049926">
          <div class="bi_file">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_4" id="content20049926">
          <p>
           Additional information on what is included with the NYTimes.com Academic site license, troubleshooting, and additional information.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20049926" class="boxatt">
           <div id="filelist">
            <ul>
             <li style="padding-top:6px; background: url('http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/file-icons.gif') 0px -60px no-repeat;" id="file1286945">
              <a id="file_1286945" style="padding-left:27px;" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/loader.php?type=d&amp;id=1286945" target="_blank" onclick="return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_FILE, link_id: 1286945});">
               NYTimes.com Academic License Overview and Key Features
              </a>
             </li>
             <li style="padding-top:6px; background: url('http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/file-icons.gif') 0px -60px no-repeat;" id="file1286946">
              <a id="file_1286946" style="padding-left:27px;" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/loader.php?type=d&amp;id=1286946" target="_blank" onclick="return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_FILE, link_id: 1286946});">
               NYTimes.com Group Pass Troubleshooting Guide
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox15117697">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="15117697">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title15117697">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Other Ways to Access the New York Times
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content15117697">
          <p>
           In addition to this campus wide site license, Trexler Library also offers the following ways to access the
           <em>
            New York Times
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            The print newspaper (recent three months worth)
           </li>
           <li>
            Microfilm (1857-2010)
           </li>
           <li>
            Online database subscriptions for online access through Lexis-Nexis or ProQuest)
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           Trexler Library will continue to maintain these other means to access the New York Times, especially given the restriction on using the NYTimes.com archive:
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             <span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'NYTFranklin';">
              <em>
               At this time, access to articles from 1923 to 1980 is limited to five articles for the entire duration of your Pass.
              </em>
             </span>
            </strong>
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt15117697" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
